sentences.en: A number of homes were burning Monday near Lake Arrowhead, in a mountain resort area.
sentences.cn: 周一, 山地旅游胜地的箭头湖附近的大量房子烧掉了.

sentences.en: Add the arrowhead to the left of navigation menu.
sentences.cn: 添加导航菜单左侧的小箭头.

sentences.en: An arrowhead is never used at the radius center.
sentences.cn: 箭头永远不可以指向圆心.

sentences.en: Arrow with a 45 - degree arrowhead and a tail.
sentences.cn: 前端呈45度且带有箭尾的箭头.

sentences.en: Arrow with a 60 - degree arrowhead and a tail.
sentences.cn: 前端呈60度且带有箭尾的箭头.

sentences.en: Arrow with adjustable arrowhead and adjustable tail.
sentences.cn: 箭头前端和箭尾形状可调的箭头.

sentences.en: Arrow with adjustable curvature and variable arrowhead location.
sentences.cn: 可调节曲度并且可以更改箭头位置的箭头形状.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then drag yellow diamonds to adjust arrowhead or tail.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后拖动黄色菱形可以调整箭头或箭尾.

sentences.en: I wanted to go, but it was a two - hour drive from Laguna to Lake Arrowhead.
sentences.cn: 我确实想去, 只是从拉古纳到箭头湖得两个小时的车程.

sentences.en: In  Figure 2, each arrowhead represents an interface.
sentences.cn: 在  图2中，每个箭头表示一个接口。

sentences.en: Oh, an arrowhead a finely crafted one.
sentences.cn: 哦, 原来是个箭头,做得还挺细致嘛.

sentences.en: Only the arrowhead , carved from some milky blue stone, had any color.
sentences.cn: 只有箭头, 是用乳状的蓝宝石雕刻的, 发出一些色泽.

sentences.en: Technology of instant arrowhead ( Sagittaria sagittrifolia ) powder was studied in the paper.
sentences.cn: 研究了速溶慈姑粉的生产工艺.

sentences.en: That portion of the dimension line extending from the arrowhead is redial relative to the arc.
sentences.cn: 指向圆弧的箭头尺寸线是相对的.
印第安人凿制燧石箭头.

sentences.en: The ranger inspected it as he might an arrowhead or spear point.
sentences.cn: 护林员像研究一个箭头或者矛尖一样研究着它。

sentences.en: They had rummaged around his thorax, trying to get close to the arrowhead and the tissue around it.
sentences.cn: 他们对他的胸腔周围进行了仔细的检查，试图靠近箭头及其周围的骨组织。

sentences.en: Zig - zag line with arrowhead used to indicate a communication link.
sentences.cn: 用于指示通信链路的带箭头的之字线条.

trans.tran_cn: 箭头，箭镟，楔形符号，<植>慈菇
trans.tran_en: the sharp pointed end of an arrow
